headline: Verizon Stock Hasn’t Done Great This Year. 2 Reasons It Looks Like a Buy Now.
summary: Verizon Communication  has had a subpar 2024 but it’s not time to hang up on the wireless giant just yet.  While  Verizon  stock is up a respectable 13% this year, it has lagged behind the broader market—and its two top telecom rivals.  The  has gained 28% this year,  AT&T  has surged 40%, and  T-Mobile  has soared more than 50%.
